shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity
Class Lin

java.lang.Object
  shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.SimilarityMeasure
      shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.PathMeasure
          shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.ICMeasure
              shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.Lin

public class Lin
extends ICMeasure

An implementation of the WordNet similarity measure developed by Lin. For full details of the measure see:

Lin D. 1998. An information-theoretic definition of similarity. In Proceedings of the 15th International Conference on Machine Learning, Madison, WI.

Author:
Mark A. Greenwood

          Instances of this similarity measure should be generated using the factory methods of SimilarityMeasure.

Method Detail

getSimilarity

public double getSimilarity(net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s1,
                            net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s2)
                     throws net.didion.jwnl.JWNLException
Description copied from class: SimilarityMeasure
This is the method responsible for computing the similarity between two specific synsets. The method is implemented differently for each similarity measure so see the subclasses for detailed information.

Specified by:
getSimilarity in class SimilarityMeasure
Parameters:
s1 - one of the synsets between which we want to know the similarity.
s2 - the other synset between which we want to know the similarity.
Returns:
the similarity between the two synsets.
Throws:
net.didion.jwnl.JWNLException - if an error occurs accessing WordNet.
